targets.query: SELECT ($average_daily_income * 365 * $age / 10) / 2- last("income:gift[£]")  - last("liabilities[£]") + last("liabilities:loan:slc[£]")  FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT ($average_daily_income * 365 * $age / 10) * 2 - last("income:gift[£]")  - last("liabilities[£]") + last("liabilities:loan:slc[£]")  FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT (($average_daily_expense - (last("expenses:rent[£]") - first("expenses:rent[£]")) / count("expenses:rent[£]")) * 365 - last("assets:pension[£/yr]")) * $fire_annual_factor FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT (($average_daily_expense - (last("expenses:rent[£]") - first("expenses:rent[£]")) / count("expenses:rent[£]")) * 365 - last("assets:pension[£/yr]")) * $fire_annual_factor - $fire_invested FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter
